shortDescription: A fresh bunch of ripe yellow bananas.
detailDescription: Sweet and nutritious bananas, perfect for breakfast or snacks. High in potassium and great for a healthy diet. Best stored at room temperature until fully ripe, then consume or refrigerate.

shortDescription: Creamy whole milk in a 1 litre bottle.
detailDescription: Rich and creamy whole milk, suitable for daily use in cereals, cooking, or drinking. Pasteurised for safety, retains full fat for flavour. Keep refrigerated and use by the printed date.

shortDescription: Organic whole grain brown rice in a 2 lb bag.
detailDescription: Healthy and hearty brown rice that keeps the nutritious bran layer intact. Ideal for side dishes, salads, or main meals. Cooks in approx 45 minutes and has a nutty flavour. Store in a cool, dry place.

shortDescription: Soft whole wheat bread loaf, 500 g.
detailDescription: Freshly baked whole wheat bread made from high-quality whole grain flour. Keeps you full longer, has natural fibre, and is perfect for sandwiches or toasting. Store in a bread box or freeze if keeping longer.

shortDescription: Crisp and juicy red apples, 1 kg pack.
detailDescription: Pack of fresh red apples, hand-picked for crispness and flavour. Great for snacking, baking, or cooking. Rich in fibre and vitamin C. Store in the fridge for longer freshness, or at room temperature to ripen.
